product_name: Drunk ElephantJuju Exfoliating Face Cleansing Bar
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingDrunk Elephant's Juju Exfoliating Face Cleansing Bar is an ultra-mild multitasking bar that deeply cleanses and subtly exfoliates.
details: DetailsBenefitsInfused with thermal mud, marula, bamboo, and superfruitDissolves excess oil, pore-clogging surface debris, and impuritiesGently exfoliates dead skin cellsPromotes moisture retentionLeaves skin feeling softer and smoother with improved clarityFormulated without harsh surfactants (like SLS, i.e. sodium lauryl sulfate)Formulated at a skin-friendly, non-stripping pH of 6.3Dermatologist TestedKey IngredientsHeilmoor Clay: A thermal mud that visibly tones and detoxifies the skinVirgin Marula Oil: This super-absorbable oil - high in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 - moisturizes, nourishes, and rejuvenates skin's appearance for a youthful-looking glowBamboo Powder: Tiny, smooth spheres that gently exfoliate away dead, dry skinFormulated WithoutMade without the Suspicious 6 - the six ingredients Drunk Elephant believes are at the root of almost every skin issue (Essential oils, Silicones, Chemical sunscreens, SLS, Fragrances + dyes, and Drying alcohols)Item 2588465How To UseWet Juju Bar and lather until creamy. With your hands, gently massage over face, neck, and chest. Rinse with warm water and pat dry. Use 2 or 3 times per week. Do not apply bar directly to skin. Avoid direct contact with eyes.Tip: Gently massage Juju's lather over chapped, rough lips to exfoliate dead skin and follow with Lippe Balm for a smooth, plump pout!IngredientsSodium Coco-Sulfate, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Starch, Cetearyl Alcohol, Bambusa Vulgaris Leaf/Stem Extract, Paraffin, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau, Heilmoor Clay, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Wet Juju Bar and lather until creamy. With your hands, gently massage over face, neck, and chest. Rinse with warm water and pat dry. Use 2 or 3 times per week. Do not apply bar directly to skin. Avoid direct contact with eyes.Tip: Gently massage Juju's lather over chapped, rough lips to exfoliate dead skin and follow with Lippe Balm for a smooth, plump pout!

reviews.headline: JuJu bar outstanding!
reviews.comments: Wanted to give this a try, heard so much about this line. Usually use Philosophy to wash my face.. well this is AMAZING! Squeaky clean seriously.. my face squeaks after I rinse! My new FAV! Love it!

reviews.headline: Gentle Exfoliation
reviews.comments: It's not easy for me to find a product that is gentle enough to exfoliate my sensitive skin. This product does the job while leaving my skin soft, not tight like other exfoliating products.

reviews.headline: Works like a charm
reviews.comments: Squeaky clean! Love this bar! It's great for traveling and also a lot less messy than a scrub! Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Finally I can buy my favorite brand at Ulta!

faceoff_positive.comments: Love this bar! It has just the right amount of exfoliation, while feeling gentle on my skin. I purchased this bar to try to reduce my plastic usage. I was thrilled with the packaging until I got the the final ‚Äúunveiling‚Äù. Everything was paper based except the bar was wrapped in a thin layer of plastic. Get rid of this plastic and it‚Äôs easily five stars for me. Unfortunately, packaging is part of the product and therefore factors into the rating.
faceoff_positive.headline: True love, minus one thing

faceoff_negative.comments: I am very sad to write this review as I do love drunk elephant. I purchased the travel duo pekee and juju bar and loved them, which is why I purchased the full size versions. I'm not sure if it was just the batch I got but they both feel like they leave a film on my face and dont actually clean it. They do not feel the same as the travel duo I received so maybe I just got some bad bars, hence the two stars:(
faceoff_negative.headline: Doesnt feel clean :(
